name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms　VII with Power Up Kit / 三國志VII with パワーアップキット
description: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅶ with Power Up Kit" is an expanded version of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅶ," which was released in 2000 as the 7th game in the series. With "Enjoy the lives of all the Romance Warriors!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. & Traditional Chinese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (*Japanese Ver. & Traditional Chinese Ver. only) Processor: 1GHz over Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 800x600 pixel over DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 22KHz WAVE file can be played
